title: How does Urgot use the bathroom?
body: Is he still in tact down there?

replies.body: Urgot doesn't use the bathroom anymore, [because he vapes](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/eJOWoJ7Z-just-a-reminder-that-graves-vaping-is-canon) and [lays eggs](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/02/ask-riot-leveling-up-in-honor/) instead. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} That explanation makes perfect sense and I'm not just avoiding the need to answer a disturbing question.
But where does he lay eggs from?...
What do you think is in those cannisters he fires?

> [{quoted}](name=Jimmy Rustles,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vEmzsa4n,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-06T17:52:06.734+0000)
>
> What do you think is in those cannisters he fires?

OK, now shooting Q at {{champion:157}} will be as satisfying as hitting R
also shotgun knees need ammo ~~poo~~ too.
He just pulls down his spider legs like pants and reveals his stubby lower half
I doubt he still eats food.
Probably unscrew the bottom of his robot body and drain it like a Mobile Home
